arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'CheckIn' adds the 'contactId' attribute below to the 'Contact' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier for Check-in associated with Contact.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Event' adds the 'originatingEvent' attribute below to the 'Contact' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the event the contact was created from, if the contact was created by registering event in Microsoft Dynamics 365. This is used to relate the contact to the data on the originating event.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'MarketingPage' adds the 'sourceLandingPage' attribute below to the 'Contact' entity as a key

constantValues: Field for the contact's invitation code.
Field for the url which contact can use to register to event portal
